Package com.composum.assets.commons.image

Class RenditionBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.composum.assets.commons.image.RenditionBuilder
  • public class RenditionBuilder
extends Object
    Builds the transient renditions in "/var/composum/assets" from the originals in /content.
